mapper.select: select Id from REQUEST ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 1;
select ReqStatus, DataId, DataType, Title, UserId, TO_CHAR(ReqDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from REQUEST left join DATA on REQUEST.DataId = DATA.Id
select ReqStatus, DataId, DataType, Title, UserId, TO_CHAR(ReqDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from REQUEST left join DATA on REQUEST.DataId = DATA.Id where UserId = #{userId};
